TopicTitle: Advanced Burn Time indicator not showing

Articles.Content: I'm not seeing the 'Time to burn' indicator at the lower right of the NavBall. I'm in a 100% stock (no mods) game and I have Advanced Tweakables active. I've combed the Main Menu Settings for another switch and can't seem to find it. Is the 'Time to Burn' indicator part of a mod?
This is part of stock functionality, and it should be there.  Can you provide an image that shows you have a maneuver node planned?

2 hours ago, Scarecrow71 said:

This is part of stock functionality, and it should be there.  Can you provide an image that shows you have a maneuver node planned?

It's showing now ... maybe it just required a restart of the game.
Time to node is stock, time to burn is part of the advanced burn indicator which is available in the main menu settings- it’s totally separate to advanced tweakables though.
